main event: Observers sighted 3 lights in a triangle formation, one large and two small, in Jasper, Alabama on October 25, 1967.
interesting points: The large light and the two smaller ones were red while the central light was green., The lights were seen for a duration of 22 seconds., The initial light lit up first followed by the outer lights., The sighting description does not match that of a conventional aircraft., The document is a response from the Project Blue Book program regarding the observation.
sighted object: three lights in a triangle formation
